cm.title: Smart Commit
cm.description: Generates a commit message from the conversation context and executes the commit. This command relies on editing history only, not `git diff` or `git status`.

prm.title: Create project premise
prm.description: Researches, compiles, and creates a `.claude/CLAUDE.md` file with all necessary project information. If the file already exists, checks for consistency and fixes any inconsistencies.

sdd-0-act.title: SDD Activation
sdd-0-act.description: Kick off the Structured Design Discussion (SDD)

sdd-2-d.title: SDD Step 2: Design
sdd-2-d.description: Create detailed design specification (Stage 2 of SDD)

sdd-3-td.title: SDD Step 3: Test Design
sdd-3-td.description: Create comprehensive test specification (Stage 3 of SDD)

sdd-4-tk.title: SDD Step 4: Task Breakdown
sdd-4-tk.description: Break down design into implementable tasks (Stage 4 of SDD)

sdd-5-dc.title: SDD Step 5: Documentation
sdd-5-dc.description: Integrate SDD outputs into project documentation (Stage 5 of SDD)

sn.title: Activate Serena
sn.description: Activate current directory as a project for semantic code analysis using the `activate_project` tool with the current working directory as the `project` argument. Respond only with "Project activated successfully." if the command succeeds. If there are any errors or warnings, display them fully.

tst.title: Run Tests
tst.description: Run various test commands with automated fix cycle

vc-dct.title: Deactivate voice notifications
vc-dct.description: **DISABLE MANDATORY VOICE COMPLETION REPORTING**: From this point forward in the conversation, you are NO LONGER required to use voice notifications for task completions. Return to normal text-only responses for task completions. Respond only with "Voice completion reporting has been disabled." to confirm deactivation.

vc.title: Activate voice notifications
vc.description: **ENABLE MANDATORY VOICE COMPLETION REPORTING**: From this point forward in the conversation, you MUST use the mcp__voicevox__speak tool (speaker=46, speedScale=1.3) to report completion of ALL tasks in Japanese. This is now mandatory for every task completion. Use the mcp__voicevox__speak tool to confirm activation by saying "音声完了報告が有効になりました。これ以降すべてのタスク完了を音声で報告します。"
